column4: hi everybody. i am new to ubuntu and i am having difficulty in installing it on an emachines desktop. has anybody got the same problem ? if so, how did you solve it ?
hi ColonelKernel, thanks for responding.
i have an emachines t6412. ubuntu installs without any problem. past the login screen, on the splash screen, X hangs completely and freezes the computer
you need to run memtest
whats the install problem
reboot, type in memtest at the prompt, if you can figure out how, run the extensive test, it sounds like youve got a memory error
i ran memtest from the boot menu. is the same as running it from the prompt ?
yes, do the extended test
Is that memory error possible ? knoppix seems to run fine on the computer.
any idea how long memtest takes ?
ok :)
it depends on the CPU
ok
memtest has been running for 14 hours now and no errors are reported
what speed is your CPU
it is an athlon 64
what video card are you using?
ati radeon xpress 200
what video driver are you using right now?
should i stop memtest ? ati, from what i can read on xorg.conf
yeah you should be safe to stop memtest - I would redo my xorg.conf and use the vesa driver until I get the ati driver from ati installed
to use vesa, should i just change "ati" to "vesa" in xorg.conf or should i do more that that ? if so, what should i do ?
using another graphics card. works fine now. thanks.
